thread.title: The rhythm of love: Experience unending romance in Goa this monsoon
thread.title_full: The rhythm of love: Experience unending romance in Goa this monsoon

title: The rhythm of love: Experience unending romance in Goa this monsoon
text: ET SPECIAL: Love visual aspect of news? Enjoy this exclusive slideshows treat! Region: Goa The state of Goa offers unspolit nature, coastal delights and unlimited options for beach lovers. Whisper sweet nothings, swim together for hours and soak in the romance of Goa with your partner this season. Taj Exotica, Goa: Slow down time to a tranquil tempo at this Mediterranean-style 5 star resort set amidst fifty-six acres of lush gardens on the southwest coast of Goa. Located in Benaulim, South Goa, this resort is the perfect place to bond with your partner. Fort Aguada, Goa: This sprawling complex of spacious villas and cottages, built on the ramparts of a 16th century Portuguese fortress, overlooks the Arabian Sea. Couples can choose from seven restaurants in the hotel. Surprise your partner by taking them to a nature trail in Goa and follow it up with a special dinner setting by the pool. Holiday Village, Goa: This picture-postcard hamlet on the fringe of the beach has charming terra cotta cottages, pretty pathways and fragrant outdoor gardens, and offers a range of indoor and outdoor recreational options. Get creative with your partner and organise a treasure hunt in the hotel for them. Panaji, Goa: This hotel is ideally located in the heart of the city. The property provides for easy access to the capital city of Panaji and Old Goa with its rich history. Perfectly situated for tourists who like a combination of old world charm with modern amenities and activities, this hotel is your best pick.
